entry.title: Ignacio Coffee Table - Marri Wood
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 1599.00

Crafted from solid, premium grade Marri - the native West Australian timber renowned for its superb quality and durability - the Ignacio Coffee Table features a raw edge for a rustic look. The grain on this Marri piece features the distinctive intricate patterns that only Marri timber boasts, giving it a uniquely beautiful appearance.
